courseName: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science & Engineering
para: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in computer science & engineering at Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Campus Institue Of Technology Gopeshwar, Chamoli, Uttarakhand, India. I have completed 7th semsters and i have a percentage of 60%.
I have done my diploma in information technology from Government polytechnic Dwarahat, Almora, Uttarakhand, India  with 74.90%.
I have done my Intermediate from Government Inter Collge Jalali, Almora, Uttarakhand, India with 60.80%.
I have done my done my High School from Government Inter College Jalali, Almora, Uttarakhand, India. with 61.40%.
